306969:
Fire haunts us
Holds us now
Bright eyes still hides us
Takes us now
Still spins us wild
...

Holding on to you
Your golden mane
Lion of Juda carries me home
...

Lights come closer to me
Shouts vibrating in me
You fly with glowing coal to me
You talk about forgiveness in me

I'm on my knees
I'm home
I fall on my face
...

Bright eyed angel
Sweeps and whispers
Come and sing me free
In a flash

Lifted up
The sound of wingbeats accompanies
Hold me, keep my heart pound
...

I took a picture
A window of My dream
A whisper of a fear
We dance with wrong chords
We dance to wrong songs
We dance with wrong chords
...

(Spoken passage from the Book of Revelation)

I'm in need of someone
...

In valleys I found my way
To seek your silence
To seek your face
...
